div.p: J.L.W.–led the writing of the paper with contributions from co-authors. J.H. co-wrote the Section “Ice Sheets as Nutrient Factories” and drafted Figs. 2 and 7. L.T. undertook modelling of past ice sheet freshwater discharge to facilitate nutrient flux calculations from Northern Hemisphere ice sheets during Meltwater Pulse 1a, L.G.–input expertise on palaeo ice sheets and past freshwater fluxes, R.S.–co-wrote the Section “Ice Sheets as Dynamic Carbon Stores”, A.R.–contributed to writing of manuscript, K.K.–co-wrote “Back to the Future–fertilisation impacts of ice sheets”, including assistance with analysis of marine core data.
